name: svelte-hero-icons
description: Heroicons for Svelte (Project heaviliy based on svelte-feather-icons by dylanblokhuis & Icons completely based on heroicons by refactoringUI)

scripts.build: npm run build:icons && npm run build:dist
scripts.clean: rm -rf src && rm -rf index.js && rm -rf index.mjs

author: Justin Voitel <justin.voitel@gmail.com>
